Name: Customer
RightsCheckScript: var result = false;  if (!userinfo.right)   return false;  switch (right) { case 'generic.page.userPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('identity.user.view');     break; case 'generic.page.rolePage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('identity.role.view');     break; case 'generic.page.documentPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.document.view');     break; case 'generic.page.tenantPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.tenant.view');     break; case 'generic.page.characteristicPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.characteristic.view');     break; case 'generic.page.entityPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.entity.view');     break; case 'generic.page.lookupPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.lookup.view');     break; case 'generic.page.pagePage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.page.view');     break; case 'generic.page.documentationPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.documentation.view');     break; case 'generic.page.subscriptionPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.subscription.view');     break; case 'generic.page.notificationPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.notification.view');     break; case 'generic.page.statisticPage':     result = userinfo.right.includes('meta.statistic.view');     break; default:     result = userinfo.right.includes(right); } return result;
